name: Blob Invaders
description: This game is in the world of Blobary.  There are multiple bad blobs in the world and you, "the red blob" has to defeat the evil blobs that come in to kill you.  The objective is to shoot your goo at them before they could do the same.  You have 3 lives as a red blob and once you get pounded by 3 separate goo, you turn white  and are unable to move, causing the game to restart.  I did almost all of the work except some of the coding that was provided by stencyl.  I did the coding for the enemy players, creating the different animations, and even did my own music from scratch.  As a person that wants to get into the music industry of game design, this project was perfect for me to test my abilities.
